protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Flexarry and RMA as normalization method. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal intensity
Leaves of the same age of plants from the 8-leaf-rosette stage were harvested and frozen directly in liquid N2.

A. thaliana plants were grown on potting soil (Stender) under controlled greenhouse conditions (daylight was supplemented with illumination from HQI Powerstar 400W/D, providing a total fluence of ~120 Âµmol photons m-2 s-1 on leaf surfaces and a 16/8 h light/dark cycle). Wuxal Super fertilizer (8% N, 8% P2O5, and 6% K2O; MANNA) was used according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Rneasy plant mini kit (QIAGEN) extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on ATH1 Genome Array in a Hyridisation Oven 640. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000
